Summary: 6 orange sphere / circles move in line across sky heading west.
divs: sighting detailsat approx. 12:15 a.m. on sunday, 9\28\08 outside of new columbia, pa at the base of a mountain, i witnessed 3 glowing circular objects moving across the sky. initially, i thought it was aircraft, but these objects were moving slower than an aircraft. it was very cloudy & foggy tonight. these objects were clearly visible, travelling under cloud cover. i watched these objects for approx. 20 seconds before running and getting friends to see this. when we returned, the initial 3 were gone, but 3 more appeared on the horizon through the trees. again, these 3 objects were glowing and circular moving in a straight line, one after the other across the sky. all 6 in total were an orange color & were travelling west. there were no flashing lights, but each seemed to have a haze around them. from where we were standing, they were about 4 inches apart in the sky. we then watched these objects slowly disappear \ vanish in the sky. they did not emit any sounds we could hear. this incident, from initial sighting to last sighting lasted about 1 minute. 1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was at a party (i was not drinking as i was the designated driver) returning from my car. 2. what made you first notice the object? i just, for whatever reason, happened to look up... 3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? first i thought they were planes- airplane lights are not one sole color & generally blink. 4. describe the object and its actions and motions. see paragraph above. 5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. i was shocked, total disbelief of what i was seeing. i'm still in disbelief, but know what i saw. 6. how did you lose sight of the object? the objects just seemed to vanish \ disappear \ fade out of sight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in New Columbia
This sighting has never been favorited.
